list.name: Default
list.comment: Added temporary route for 'about' that just loads the main route.

task.summary: Default task
Added phpStorm project files.
Split out the header and footer into different files.
Added an unstyled menu to the website.
Added a basic menu to the project and added styling to the global header.
Edited Summary.mdown.
Added a new view for logged in users and edited the logged-out menu.
Edited some configuration files for database access.
Added a constructor to the Welcome controller. In the constructor, load the url helper, which we'll use inside the menu view.
Use the site_url() function inside the menu view.
enabled 'translate_uri_dashes' in the routes config file.
Added missing documentation to Routes.mdown.
Made some tweaks to Routes.mdown.
Stubbed the users API.
Added the auction info the landing page.
Implemented the stub for the catalog API and added a route for the package endpoint.
Enabled public access to the assets directory.
Edited the style in the global header.
Added a custom webfont to the global header.
Changed route in default menu to point to the login form in the users controller.
Factored most of the style into a seperate stylesheet.
Added some form styling.
Improved login view.
Basic login implementation. (NOTE! Does not deal with hashing at all.)
Fixed now incorrect reference to global views in Catalog controller.
Updated logged-in menu.
Added check when rendering menu to account for login.
Adjusted form appearance in the css file.
Added is_organizer property.
Added temporary route for 'about' that just loads the main route.
Added a view for sign up forms.
Added temporary route for 'about' that just loads the main route.
Tweaked the routes spec.
Swapped order of login form buttons.
Use simpler sign-up that includes a simpler backend and collects phone numbers.
